summary: Adds a power that allows you to change your appearance.
descriptionHtml:
[b]This is a beta plugin, always keep a save file before using it, if you notice any issues please report them in the comments.[/b]

[b]Description[/b]

This mod adds a new spell tome for the Metamorphosis power to the game. Metamorphosis allows you to change your appearance once a day, but not your race or name. After learning the spell you can find it in the Powers section. It also works on vampires and werewolfs.

If you own the Dawnguard DLC you can already change your appearance by visiting the face sculptor in Riften. However unlike this mod she will refuse to work on you if you are a vampire or werewolf.

You can find the spelltome by revisiting Helgen in the place where you first started your adventure.

[b]Technical details[/b]

This mod works like the ShowRaceMenu, but instead uses the ShowLimitedRaceMenu function. The instabilities and issues mentioned in the official documentation have been patched after the release of the Dawnguard DLC, so it is completely safe to use this function.

[b]Compatibility[/b]

May not be compatible with mods that make changes to Helgen.

[b]Troubleshooting[/b]

If you can not find the spelltome in the game, you can grant it to to yourself by finding the item ID for the spelltome using "help Metamorphosis" in the console. After you've found the ID, you can grant it to yourself using player.additem <item ID>.
author: Armada

files.name: Metamorphosis
files.changelogHtml:
Casting Metamorphosis now grants the "A new you" achievement
Fixed BSA version not loading the script
Minor improvements to scripting
